metadata.title: CVE-2024-26679 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: inet:read sk->sk_family once in inet_recv_error() inet_recv_error() is calledwithout holding the socket lock. IPv6 socket could mutate to IPv4 withIPV6_ADDRFORM socket option and trigger a KCSAN warning.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
